metadata.dc:author: López Collado, M
Val Bernal, F
Fernández García, P
metadata.dc:description: It is described a desquamative interstitial pneumonia in a three months old infant, in whom the diagnosis was established by necropsy. It is the 5th case younger than six months of age, published in the literature. The clinical and pathologic features of disease are briefly reviewed.
metadata.dc:title: Neumonía intersticial descamativa en un niño de tres meses de edad
[Desquamative interstitial pneumonia in a 3-month-old boy].
